title: Goal 3: Good Health And Well Being
desc: To address disparities in health care and to prevent needless suffering and premature deaths through the application of research findings drawn from various accounting, management, and business disciplines.

title: Goal 8: Decent Work and Economic Growth
desc: Research across diverse disciplines, including business models, management, and sustainable development, offers insights crucial for fostering sustained economic growth, full employment, and equitable work opportunities

title: Goal 12: Responsible Consumption and Production
desc: Focus: Exploring innovative approaches to resource efficiency, waste reduction, and sustainable production and consumption practices through cutting-edge technologies, contributing to sustainable development.
session1: Session4: Home Session Tracks: Business, Management Studies & Accounting
objective: Objective: To identify strategies and tools that integrate advanced technologies into business practices, enabling efficient resource management, minimizing waste, and promoting sustainability in production and consumption cycles.

title: Goal 17: Partnerships for the Goals
desc: Focus: Exploring the role of digital initiatives and advanced technologies in creating and implementing smart solutions to accelerate sustainability efforts through global partnerships for sustainable development

title: 5. Cooling System Care
